actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the act of June 3, 1960 (74 Stat. 156), authorizing the Secretary of the Interior to construct the San Luis unit, Central Valley project, California.

summary.text: Modifies the authorization for the construction of the San Luis Unit of the Central Valley Project in California to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct wells for the integration of ground water. Authorizes the appropriation of $217,000,000 for fiscal year 1978 and thereafter for the completion of such wells, distribution systems, drains and related facilities.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act of June 3, 1960 (74 Stat. 156), authorizing the Secretary of the Interior to construct the San Luis unit, Central Valley project, California.
